## IStateSyncConfig.stateStorage property

State storage to use, State storage is responsible for serialising / deserialising and persisting / retrieving stored state

There are common strategies already implemented: see [IOsdUrlStateStorage](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-plugins-opensearch_dashboard_utils-public-state_sync.iosdurlstatestorage.md) which replicate what State (AppState, GlobalState) in legacy world did

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
stateStorage: StateStorage;
```
